# Development Guide

## ğŸ  Use node version

Ensure you are on the right version of NodeJS. To see the active version, check [the .nvmrc file](../app/.nvmrc).

```sh
nvm use
```

## ğŸƒ Running the project

To run the project, run:

```sh
pnpm dev
```

## ğŸ—ï¸ Building the project

To build the project, run:

```sh
pnpm build
```
